About this product map

This website is a personal Proof of Concept to display OVHcloud products portfolio organization.

It's clearly inspired from GCP Developer Cheat Sheet.

Backend with Pandas and Jinja2, then Bootstrap and Masonry for the frontend.

Github project page

Filter our product map

Service model :
Billing mode :
Hardware tenancy model :
Network :
Product phase :

Compute

Servers Virtual Machines and Containers

AI Deploy

Deploy your AI Docker apps or models with high availability
Alpha

OVHcloud Website

Official Documentation

Technical details

Hardware tenancy : multi_tenant

Public Network availability : public_ipv4

Private Network availability (vRack) : unavailable

Code Automation (Infras as code) : False

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : False
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : False
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : False
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : False
  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : False
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : False
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False
  • North America / Canada / Beauharnois : True
  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : False
  • North America / USA / VintHill : False

Compliancy and certifications

  • ISO 27001 : True
  • HDS : True
  • HIPAA : missing info.
  • PCI-DSS : False
  • SecNumCloud : False
  • SOCx type I : missing info.
  • SOCx type II : missing info

  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : True

  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : True
  • North America / USA / VintHill : True

Technical details

Hardware tenancy : multi_tenant

Public Network availability : unavailable

Private Network availability (vRack) : private_ipv4

Code Automation (Infras as code) : True

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : True
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : True
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : True
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : True
  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : True
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : True
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False
  • North America / Canada / Beauharnois : True
  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : False
  • North America / USA / VintHill : False

Compliancy and certifications

  • ISO 27001 : False
  • HDS : False
  • HIPAA : missing info.
  • PCI-DSS : False
  • SecNumCloud : False
  • SOCx type I : missing info.
  • SOCx type II : missing info

  • SOCx type I : missing info.

  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : True
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : False
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : True
  • North America / Canada / Beauharnois : True
  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : True
  • North America / USA / VintHill : True

  • ISO 27001 : True
  • HDS : nan
  • HIPAA : missing info.

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True

Hardware tenancy : multi_tenant

Public Network availability : public_ipv4

Private Network availability (vRack) : unavailable

Code Automation (Infras as code) : False

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : False
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : False
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : False
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : False
  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : False
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : False
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False
  • North America / Canada / Beauharnois : True
  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : False
  • North America / USA / VintHill : False

  • ISO 27001 : True
  • HDS : True
  • HIPAA : missing info.
  • PCI-DSS : False

Public Network availability : public_ipv4

Private Network availability (vRack) : private_ipv4

Code Automation (Infras as code) : True

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : False
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : True
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : True
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : True
  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : True
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : False
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False

  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : False
  • North America / USA / VintHill : False

  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : True

Technical details

Hardware tenancy : multi_tenant

Public Network availability : public_ipv4

Private Network availability (vRack) : unavailable

Code Automation (Infras as code) : True

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : False
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : False
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : False
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : False

  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False

Hardware tenancy : multi_tenant

Public Network availability : public_ipv4

Private Network availability (vRack) : unavailable

Code Automation (Infras as code) : False

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : True
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : False
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : False
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : False
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : False
  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : False
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : False
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False
  • North America / Canada / Beauharnois : True
  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : False
  • North America / USA / VintHill : False

  • HDS : True

Private Network availability (vRack) : unavailable

Code Automation (Infras as code) : False

Proposed datacenters :

  • Europe / France / Gravelines : False
  • Europe / France / Roubaix : True
  • Europe / France / Strasbourg : False
  • Europe / Germany / Frankfurt : True
  • Europe / Poland / Warsaw : False
  • Europe / United Kingdom / London : False
  • Asia / Singapore / Singapore : False
  • Asia / Australia / Sydney : False
  • North America / Canada / Beauharnois : True
  • North America / USA / Hilsboro : False
  • North America / USA / VintHill : False

Compliancy and certifications

  • ISO 27001 : True
  • HDS : True
  • HIPAA : missing info.
  • PCI-DSS : False
  • SecNumCloud : False
